description:
Speaker: Chris Schuhmacher

In 2017, I was released from prison after serving 17 years. One of the most transformational experiences I had while incarcerated was learning to code, through a pioneering new program called Code.7370 — the first coding curriculum in a United States prison.

More details: /redirect?q=https%3A%2F%2Fus.pycon.org%2F2018%2Fschedule%2Fpresentation%2F141%2F&v=dGz-K8x8k5k&event=video_description&redir_token=zNbKPgsHf6W4ZYMMg20aQt4nzn98MTUyNjUwODQ4OEAxNTI2NDIyMDg4

Slides can be found at: https://speakerdeck.com/pycon2018 and https://github.com/PyCon/2018-slides
title: Coding through Adversity
